extendedInfo.description: Fireplace Market is the all new app-store for rooted android devices. This means: the applications which require root will be available for all rooted users; this includes apps removed from Android Market. We are working hard on bringing you the features you would expect in an app-store.To have our server up, we would appreciate that you download and install our donate version. *Donate version includes, private server (faster response), as well as no ads. By buying Fireplace Market you help us to support and upgrade our servers as well as pushing updates.If you would like to see your root application featured on the Fireplace Market, please visit http://www.fireplace-market.comIf you notice an issue, please report it to  http://code.google.com/p/fireplace/issues/list

reviews.title: Ok...
reviews.comment: Please put other apps on this app :) I would suggest: Asphalt 7, GTA 3, Angry Birds Space, Need for speed shift, and other apps which costs :) This app can be better!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OG Droid
reviews.comment: Fore closes a few seconds after I open it. Good idea though. Don\'t know if my device is still supported though :P
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Devs! Your doing a great job!
reviews.comment: 5+ stars. Please understand what you are reviewing before leaving low ratings. This is a root only app with repo capabilities.  :D awesome!!!! As well, do not rant about receiving free apps. That is not the goal here. That would be stealing in plain sight. Android is open source, most apps are not. Go to xda and educate yourself. If you do not see any apps, go to the main screen >> menu button >> settings >> refresh apps >> profit!!
reviews.author: Chris Rae

reviews.title: Sad day.
reviews.comment: I was really excited when I found this app, as I had yet to find a market for root only apps, sort of an android cydia. But I have a rooted amazon kindle fire running cm9 and the app always force closes several seconds after opening. If this app actually worked and it had more apps on it, I would be a huge fan. As I said above, sad day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rooted ATRIX 2 Bullet Supercharged V5 Rom
reviews.comment: Repeatedly Force closed. Will try again at later time and change rating when I can at least see the maim screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love this app, great for rooted phones. Ive supported this app before it even had apps, lol but its great n grows daily now. Adfree is outdated n needs to b updated, n some dl\'s dont parse fully, but an excellent app nonetheless. Btw mine never crashes.
reviews.author: Jovan Schluer

reviews.title: Force stop
reviews.comment: Looks like it could be a cool app,force stopped repeatedly,removed and re install,still no go.not working on rooted HTC one x

reviews.title: THERE IS NO APPS IN THIS APP MARKET
reviews.comment: Dont download.  I open it and every category says there are no apps in here
reviews.author: Adam Williams

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I like it got me unlimited coins for subway surfers
reviews.author: NOAH WATSON

reviews.title: get it moving....
reviews.comment: dev! Had this a couple of months now with no app updates - Needs more apps. Almost as many categories as there are apps. This must be the only app provider that has LESS apps listed (17) than the (root) apps I already have installed! (25) from market. Could be useful to have all root apps in one place, but not with such a meagre collection, most of which root users already have as essentials!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What a Shame!
reviews.comment: force closes, no apps on the list, poor design( not just using ics style is all) xda devs remove this crap from ur forums is a very poor app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Apps in Catagories
reviews.comment: This thing honestly sucks I hate it. It only shows my installed apps and there is no apps in any catagories my phone is completly rooted this app is horrible if  you fix it I would be happy but now I wish there was a zero star option
reviews.author: Isaac Meji

reviews.title: ill give five stars when doesnt force close
reviews.comment: i dont know what that other reviews about this is for root apps and non market (not angrybirds or asphalt 7) will be great when working and devs should add all non market apps aswell.  and a search button (if there is a lot of apps)
